page.title: 03Ecology
page.content: There are several places in{Montrose} where one can see the local flora and fauna. 1.The{Curlie Pond}houses toads,newts, tadpoles and stickle-backs,while ducks,swans,moorhens and coots live in the nearby reeds.Plants in this area include whin,broom and bramble bushes. 2.The sand-dunes of{Montrose Beach} provides a home for rabbits,most sea- birds and sand insects.The principal grasses on the dunes are lyme and marram.Recently a board-walk was built to stop erosion. 3.The nature reserve,{Montrose Basin,} provides a safe home for all types of sea-birds.In the winter many birds migrate from foreign lands to spend the winter;one such visitor is the rare pink-footed goose.A few years ago a pair of black swans spent the winter at the{Basin.}
